name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatTube - Chat with any YouTube video

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatTube enables you to chat with any YouTube video - ask questions, get summaries, pinpoint key points and so much more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**ChatTube version 1.7.0 introduces support for transcript-free videos**

🎓 Online Learning
📖 Instant Summaries
🖥️ Product Reviews
🗺️ Travel Planning
🍕 Food Recommendations
and more!

How to use:
1. Install this extension
2. Open a YouTube video
3. Sign in and chat!

If you need help, feel free to contact: support@chattube.io
